title: Word of the Day Watch Trial
summary: Learn a new language with a word of the day, few hours, or every hour!
description: *****************This is a try before you buy version.  It comes with limited words so you can see the look of the watch face before purchasing the full version.  *****************Get your word of the day on the go and on your watch!Our watch face brings you much more than the current time of day; it brings you a new word in a different language of your choice!• Customize appearance with different material color schemes• Choose any combination of English, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, and Spanish (more languages to come)• Choose between different hourly or daily frequencies• Full support for 12 hour and 24 hour clock and ambient modeThe journey of a thousand languages begins with the first word!
descriptionHTML:
*****************
This is a try before you buy version. It comes with limited words so you can see the look of the watch face before purchasing the full version.
*****************
Get your word of the day on the go and on your watch!

Our watch face brings you much more than the current time of day; it brings you a new word in a different language of your choice!

• Customize appearance with different material color schemes
• Choose any combination of English, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, and Spanish (more languages to come)
• Choose between different hourly or daily frequencies
• Full support for 12 hour and 24 hour clock and ambient mode

The journey of a thousand languages begins with the first word!
comments: Not bad I'm looking forward to Italian support before purchasing. Please remove the blank space at the bottom on square devices.
recentChanges: - Articles now added for non-English languages
